channel.title: Mobile on negleft
channel.description: Recent content in Mobile on negleft

item.title: Privacy policy for mobile apps/games
item.description: Last Updated: April 21, 2024 negleft (“we,” “us,” or “our”) respects the privacy of our users (“user” or “you”) and is committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines the types of information we may collect from you when you use our mobile applications (Android/iOS) (“Apps”) and how we use, share, and protect that information. By using our Apps, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.
